content:
I've checked the PR link on the website as well as specification file in the implementation repo.
The former looks abandoned and the latter is empty.
Where does the work on the specification happens right now? I'm interested in design decision discussions and participating

Log-Based Registry: phase 1 proposal by esoterra 路 Pull Request #25 路 bytecodealliance/SIG-Registries
Rendered I've worked with @npmccallum and @lann to combine their sketches into a unified phase 1 proposal for a log-based registry. The Open Questions section contains a number of remaining decisio...

Docs are quite sparse right now. You can find some specification info in the Open API doc and the protobufs. Beyond that we're mostly iterating on the design through PRs to the reference implementation. Formal specification is a goal but we haven't had the resources to dedicate to it.

Most of the design discussions are happening in meetings or in the GitHub discussions pages. You can find our meeting info and notes in the meetings repo
